summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4923 for the improvement of the alley in block 11, Replat of J.J. McGilvra's 3rd Addition, being the alley between 41st Avenue North, from East Garfield Street to East Blaine Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 56414, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll , establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
